ngiemboon: Peg neŋé tà ńgyá á ye vàg ncwò ndá.
en: We stayed until we saw him promptly at the door.

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀acʉa zyɛʼɛ́ ssé ndá lê vàg.
en: The smile happened very quickly (quickly) in the house.
sound of a wraparound skirt or large piece of clothing during walking

ngiemboon: Manzwě ne ńgine, sànzà yé gӱo lê vùb.
en: The woman is walking and her loincloth goes “vùb”.

ngiemboon: À lɔ̌g ngwɔɔn ńcʉ́a múɔ, e gӱo na nzsǒ lê vûb.
en: He hit the child with the whip and that made “vûb” on the coat.
sound of a car going by
